name: Firestorm
desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

name: Hookshot
desc: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Enchant Totem
desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Caustic Finale
desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.

name: Liquid Fire
desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

name: False Promise
desc: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

name: Shackleshot
desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

name: Shadow Dance
desc: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
